description: This is a route definition file for an Express.js API server. It defines endpoints for a simple 'Hello World' message and CRUD operations for Employee records, including Swagger API documentation annotations.

methods.name: router.get('/hello')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to /hello, returning a 'Hello World' message.

methods.name: router.post('/employees')
methods.description: Creates a new employee record via the employeesController.

methods.name: router.get('/employees')
methods.description: Retrieves all employee records via the employeesController.

methods.name: router.put('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Replaces an existing employee record identified by employeeId.

methods.name: router.patch('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Partially updates an employee record identified by employeeId.

methods.name: router.delete('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Deletes an employee record identified by employeeId.
